comments:
if you have a source file which contains some classes, first open them in Open 
Type Hierarchy view, then make some changes in the source file such as move a 
class in/out from a namespace, save the changes, make sure the indexer kicks 
in. Try reopen the same class in Hierarchy view from outline view, an error 
message pops out and NPE is generated as below. And the view becomes unusable. 
Restart the IDE will solve it.

**********************
